GRADING PROCEDURES
Final scores will be determined by the following system:
(1) Reading-based class assignments 30%
(2) Case Studies Presentations 30%
(3) Research Presentation and Written Report 40%
評価.備考Note0: Group oral presentation topics should deal with how global forces have influenced Japan at the international, national, community or individual levels or in some dimensions; or how Japan has affected the outside world. Presentation by each student should be less than 12 minutes in each group.
